name: Beat Seizure
description:
Platformer x Rhythm Game for the Mix & Game Jam!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WARNING: DO NOT PLAY IF PRONE TO EPILEPTIC FITS OR SHOCKS!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

W / Space = Jump

A = Left

D = Right

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In the case that the WebGL does not load, please refresh your browser, or use the attached zip files for Windows & MacOS respectively.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In this game, you play as a square, that simply cannot resist dancing to music, thus when music turns on, your movement will vary based on the pitch and speed of the music! This is a rhythmic Platformer, made for the 2020 Mix and Game Jam! It was created in 48 hours, and was our first time participating in an event of this sort. Hope you enjoy :)

By Mihir Malik and Arjun Sabherwal, two students who took up an interest in game development.
